code: import React from'react';import moment from'moment';import'./Message.css';import{withTheme}from'@material-ui/core/styles';function Message(props){var data=props.data,isMine=props.isMine,startsSequence=props.startsSequence,endsSequence=props.endsSequence,showTimestamp=props.showTimestamp;var friendlyTimestamp=moment(data.timestamp).local().format('LLLL');return React.createElement("div",{className:['message',""+(isMine?'mine':''),""+(startsSequence?'start':''),""+(endsSequence?'end':'')].join(' ')},showTimestamp&&React.createElement("div",{className:"timestamp"},friendlyTimestamp),React.createElement("div",{className:"bubble-container"},React.createElement("div",{className:"bubble",title:friendlyTimestamp},data.message)));}var MessageWT=withTheme(Message);export default MessageWT;
